## Load in Packages
```{r}
library(AOI)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidygeocoder)
library(leaflet)
```

## Example dataset
```{r}
a <- c("807 Union Street, Schenectady, NY", 
       "2151 River Road, Niskayuna, NY")

b <- c("loc 1", "loc 2")
```

```{r}
c <- data.frame(name = b, addr = a)
```

## Geocode
```{r}
df_coords <- geocode(.tbl = c, address = addr, method = 'census')
```
## Make a map
```{r}
df_coords %>% 
  leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addMarkers(lng = ~long, lat = ~lat)
```
